name: Inner Light (itch)
description:
Walk through Gabe's unconscious mind, dealing with his fears, emotions and motivations.Your actions and the memories you decide to see and confront will change what is happening in the real world.

This game is on alpha version and is not maintained since 2015. However, we plan to get back to it in the future.

Credits:

  • Marcelo Rigon - Game Design and Lead Programmer
  • Lucas Dias - Programmer
  • Mariana Zancheta - Artist
